titles.title: Fixing Our Eyes On You, Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Fixing our eyes on You, Jesus,
The Author and the Finisher of faith,
Who for the joy set before You
Endured the cross, despised the shame,
And is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.
Chorus:
He who overcomes will I grant to sit down
With Me upon My throne
As I indeed overcame and sat down
With my Father upon His throne.
To the only wise God and Savior
Be glory and majesty, dominion and power,
Both now and forevermore.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Fixing our eyes on You, Jesus,
The Author and the Finisher of faith,
For You shall lead us to glory
All those who take up their cross
Which to us who are now being saved
Is the power of God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Fixing our eyes on You, Jesus,
The Author and the Finisher of faith,
For we see that we are encompassed
By so great a cloud of witnesses
Who were slain for the Word of their God
For the truth to which they did hold.
